site_name: Former Electricity Sub Station next to School, Anson Road, London
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 2 (Details of landscaping, fencing along boundaries and boundary planters and/or screens on balconies, roof terrace and garden areas), of Variation of condition application reference 23/0514 dated 11/04/2023 for Variation of Condition No 2 (Development carried out in accordance with approved drawings and documents) and 3 (External Materials) of Full Planning Permission reference 19/2354 dated 27 August, 2019, for Demolition of existing substation and redevelopment of the site to provide 4 residential dwellings & associated hard and soft landscaping
